subject: Checkout
description_text:
I’m checking out to Latvia (EU). My order value after discount is under
€150, but at checkout VAT is not shown and it says “final tax will be
confirmed by email”.
Can you confirm if this order will be shipped under *IOSS* (VAT collected
at checkout), so I will *not* pay VAT on delivery?
If not IOSS, is it shipped *DDP* or *DAP*?

conversations.body_text: Hi Maris Benfelds,    Please don't worry—we provide IOSS customs clearance, so you won't have to pay any additional taxes or fees upon receiving your order.
